abstract: Another lender to bankrupt U.S. cable TV operator Charter Communications has objected to the company’s reorganization plan, saying Charter’s attempt to reinstate $11.8 billion of debt may not be feasible, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: Another lender to bankrupt U.S. cable TV operator Charter Communications has objected to the company’s reorganization plan, saying Charter’s attempt to reinstate $11.8 billion of debt may not be feasible, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Wells Fargo Objects to Charter’s Bankruptcy Plan
